root.title: Learning Paradigms
root.content:
AI Learning Paradigms

These are the fundamental approaches and methodologies used to enable machines to learn from data.

machine-learning.title: Machine Learning
machine-learning.content:
Machine Learning

The foundational field of AI focused on algorithms that allow computers to learn from and make predictions on data. Click to zoom in.

deep-learning.title: Deep Learning
deep-learning.content:
Deep Learning

A powerful subfield of Machine Learning that uses multi-layered neural networks to learn from vast amounts of data. Click to zoom in.
